track.strDescriptionEN:
"Genie in a Bottle" is a song recorded by American recording artist Christina Aguilera for her self-titled debut album (1999). The song was written by producers Steve Kipner and David Frank, alongside Pamela Sheyne. Released as the first single from Christina Aguilera, "Genie in a Bottle" met with huge commercial success, and established Aguilera's name in the music industry.

The song reached top 10 in every country it charted, and peaked at number one on U.S. Billboard Hot 100, as well as in Canada, Austria, Norway, Spain, Denmark, Belgium and the United Kingdom. It stayed for five consecutive weeks at the top of Billboard Hot 100. Critics positively reviewed "Genie in a Bottle", calling it mature, clever and provocative. Aguilera's vocal performance was also praised and critically acclaimed. The song—which was considered as a catchy anthem—itself became the biggest summer hit of 1999. The music video for "Genie in a Bottle" gained a lot of airplay on worldwide music channels, including MTV. The song is considered as one of Aguilera's biggest hits.
